text: The cast and crew of ` ` Veep'' crowd the photo room as Julia Louis - Dreyfus ( C ) holds her Emmys at the 67th Primetime Emmy Awards on September 20, 2015. File Photo by Jim Ruymen / UPI | License Photo Nov. 16 ( UPI ) - - Production on Veep's seventh and last season has been delayed as star Julia Louis - Dreyfus continues her battle against breast cancer. Veep executive producer Frank Rich gave an update on the actress Wednesday on Sirius XM radio show The Press Pool where he confirmed that production has been postponed as Louis - Dreyfus continues to receive treatment. ` ` I can tell you that Julia is undergoing treatment for breast cancer and we're obviously postponing production of the show.
